name: Egg Rumble
description:
Collect eggs and score as many points as possible.

Look out for the golden eggs and beat your opponent to the egg to secure more points. Chase your opponent and bump into them to make them lose their egg.

As the good egg you want to save all the eggs and bring them to the nests. The bad egg will throw the eggs on rocks and break them. To sabotage your opponent you can throw the rotten egg into the other players container.

Controls: movement - pickup/throw

Good egg: wasd - qe

Bad egg: ijkl - uo

Team

Artist: Jorrit

Programmer: Jochen

Programmer: Joren

Programmer: Florian
